kick.title: Tabbatar da dan wasan harbi
kick.content: Shin kun tabbata kuna son harbi daga cikin É—akin?

ban.title: Tabbatar da membobin da aka dakatar
ban.content: Shin kun tabbata kuna son hana wannan memba? Memba ba zai iya samun damar shiga cikin dakin bayan dakatarwar ba.

toast.loadError: Ba a yi nasarar saukar da jerin membobin ba

ban.error: Ba a yi nasarar toshe mambobi ba

invite.title: Gayyato membobi su shiga dakin
invite.inputLabel: Da fatan za a shigar da ID na mai amfani da Matrix (kamar @user: Matrix.org)
invite.error: Gayyatar ta gaza, don Allah duba ID mai amfani ko izini
